other_tests.findings: All tests for known metallo-beta-lactamases (blaIMP and blaVIM) were negative. The presence of class 1 integron aminoglycoside acetyltransferase-6â€™ type 1b (aacA7) was confirmed by PCR.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After new metallo-beta-lactamases were reported, the E. coli isolates were retested for NDM-1 using specific primers targeting the gene, and the result was consistent with NDM-1.
